module.name: analysis_assignment
module.keywords: module, systems engineering, analysis, analysis assignment

abstract.li: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of relationships between analysis and the assignment of analysis to an aspect of the design.

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of relationships between analysis and the assignment of analysis to an aspect of the design. In addition to the analysis of product data, psychometric analysis must be related to persons, project plans must be analysed, cost must be analysed, etc.

inscope.li: relationships between analysis and aspects of design;
the assignment of analysis to product data;
the assignment of analysis to objects other than products.
